reviews.sentence: Bargain and near the beach. It is what it is. Stayed one night on a business trip because it was near my event and it was reasonably priced for this area. Small room rather dark lumpy pillows and a thin motel blanket. Shower was tiny. Clean though and the staff was super nice and helpful. it is a really quick walk to a beautiful beach so it makes this a popular spot for surfers and families. In this very pricey area it is a good choice if your expectations are not too high.

pleasant suprise. My husband and stayed for two nights during the week. The hotel does not look like a quiet place from the outside. However when we reached our room it was spacious and quiet. We had a room with only one neighbor. Our room was equipped with a spacious refrigerator including a small freezer microwave coffee maker and cabinets. We had a room with two double beds. This hotel is close to the beach. We rode our bikes all over town for two days. there is a good Mexican restaurant right across the parking lot. A great find.

perfect for a langer stay at la jola. very friendly employees second room was very clean just 1 minute by foot to the beach late check outfirst room was hairy on our last day there was a cockroach in our bathroom.

Great stay great location very nice people. I really enjoyed my stay here. Only 2 blocks from the Pacific and very convenient with the city bus stop right outside. The hotel offers a very small breakfast but there is a cute little cafe right next door with good food. The whole La Jola atmosphere was very relaxing and peaceful. The neighborhood was quiet with not much until you are about a mile away. I walked all around at different times of the day evening and had no issues. The city bus also allows you to easily go into San Diego downtown but I actually enjoyed La Jola area much more. Just walking along the beach and cliffs breathing in the ocean air. The hotel room itself was clean spacious enough bed comfy. No issues. TV and wifi worked. A C was controllable. Definitely would stay here again on my next La Jola trip.
Deal for the money. Great deal for location they had continental breakfast with cereal in am. Staff were very pleasant and helpful. Air conditioner worked.

Comfortable clean simple acomodation in pricey La Jola. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They were willing to go out of their way to do the most for our comfort. Their restaurant recommendation proved excellent. Location near beach not far from attractions in a very nice area although close to roadway. There was nothing we disliked. This is not an upscale acomodation furnishings and plumbing are a little out of date. But it is well maintained clean and comfortable. We would stay again and recommend it to others looking for reasonably priced lodging in an expensive town.

Excellent experience. Great location. My wife and I stayed for 9 days and had a great time in San Diego and the surrounding area. This hotel was very nice breakfast was good and there was plenty of free parking. Staff was extremely friendly and I would be happy to stay at his location again if I get the chance to visit the area in the future. It was a good value for the price and we experienced no problems whatsoever.

Location Location Location. Although this Travelodge is older and could use some updating it is still a supreme value. It is a few blocks from the beach next door to a fabulous coffee brunch place and walking distance to so much that La Jola has to offer. The rooms are clean the pool is small but perfect for kids and the hot tub is lovely. In addition to this every single person on the staff was helpful kind and knowledgeable. Breakfast is definitely just continental so if you had like something more substantial healthy the coffee brunch place next door is a great option. All in all this was a fabulous family stay.

As clean as a whistle. The bed was comfy and the room was spotless. there is not a lot of parking but it is free. The staff is super friendly. The location is very good and would be great if it was a half mile up the road but I would not let that keep me from staying here again. The furniture is a little worn.

Good location great staff rooms need remodel for sanitary and child hygiene purposes. Front desk staff. Will Tricia Lisa were superlative. Maintenance. amd housekeeping were also very courteous. Very close to beautiful beaches and across from great Mexican restaurant. Rooms need some TLC carpet needs changing and deep steam cleaning bi weekly. Ventilation is bad rooms need more access to fresh air.

Good staff good potential owners need to reinvest to make it better. The Staff Erika in particular were really welcoming and helpful. Customer orientation has huge appeal. The location of the Travelodge was also ideal for a visit to La Jola area. The staff were very good about allowing us to change to a different room soon after our arrival as well as accommodating changes to our schedule. This was highly appreciated. For that reason we may consider returning. The decor in the rooms is old and well beyond refurbishment. We were pleased to see major renovation efforts underway at the hotel however it would have been good to know that prior to booking. In addition the rooms are old and musty and currently can not be compared to the equivalent value when paying the same price at a larger chain.

My Stay in La Jola. La Jola San Diego. The property is undergoing renovations and will look decent once complete. I had the shower curtain rod fall during shower nearly knocked me out. did not even offer a discount after having something like this happen. The refrigerator was moldy and needed some cleaning also no phone or iron or ironing board in the room. There is not a closet or luggage rack to place suitcase on so your luggage is on the floor the entire time. They do provide a microwave in the rooms which is nice. There is a very small continental breakfast provided from 6 to 10 in the check in area which is small a bit awkward if you ask me. Overall though it was a decent price for being last minute reservations and location is fabulous. Lots of beach viewing close by and a good amount of restaurants not to far from the property.
Great landing spot after hours of travel. Close to great beach. Only thing missing from room was a luggage stand. New EVERYTHING. Parking lot was still full of remodeling.

Not very happy with the stay at this property. The location was good. Very close to Beaches at the La Jola. There were good restaurants near by. The staff were friendly. I do not think the hotel room was worth what I paid for. There was renovation underway when we arrived. There was excessive noise from the construction which usually started from 8 am. We usually woke up with the noise which was very displeasing. The hotel and bokingcom websites do not flag this. I wish I knew there was construction still going on then I would not have booked this. Please do check before you book. The hotel description says it is a boutique hotel but its more like an In Motel. The room was newly renovated. The floor board creaked. The bed was not very comfortable. There was no mirror in the room for dressing up. There were a few other things that I did not like eg They did not refill the shower gel and and shampoo. no hooks in bathroom dust from building works outside. Breakfast was served in the reception which was a converted bedroom. It was chaotic and very disappointing. The breakfast was okay. For eg The croissants seemed stale one day and there were very less options of savory items the other day.

Good. Walking distance to ocean newly updated room with very comfortable bed. Nice TV good free coffee andcharging plugs in the nightstand It did n’t occur to me to take pictures. Our room was quite small for 2 people. Bathroom was really small but all you needed was in there. The hanging sliding door comes off the rail if you are not careful. It needs a doorstop too.

Comfy room walking distance to Windansea beach. Beds and linens comfy and clean. Room was quite spacious. Floor got my feet quite dirty. Probably swept but not mopped. Walls very thin. Could hear some getting ready music from the next room one morning. Also there was a teething baby in the room next to us. if not for earplugs we would have been up all night. Air con was hit or miss.

We had a newly refurbished room which was clean. The barn style bathroom door does not cover the entire door opening which was weird. There are no drawers for putting things away. There were no hangers in the open style closet. There was no cups or shampoo in the room.

Great location. Clean. Spacious rooms. Walking distance location for beach and great restaurants. Staff was very friendly and efficient. As I was leaving I saw they had bikes available you might want to check into that. The mattress in our room was super soft the kind that sinks inwards when you sit on it. My wife and I are both in our 50s and would have preferred more support when sleeping. As a result neither of us got a decent nights sleep. Our kids on the other hand did not even notice and slept well. The reception area tv had CN on the whole time. Could find remote to change. FYI management some of us go on vacation to escape from such things.

Bad experience. Bed is soft. 字數限制負評無法翻譯，但大家參考一下吧！On the day we checked in and entered the room we found that there is no shampoo and body wash in the room. Then we just took a shower by warm water. But next day after we checked out a staff called us and told us she ’s gon na charge me 10 cuz we took the shampoo away. We gently explained that we did n’t take anything away the truth is they forgot to put shampoo and body wash in our room. We explained for almost 10mins and she just said ‘ I still have to charge you 10. We NEVER forget to put shampoo in the rooms ’. We felt a bit angry. This kind of attitude is so RUDE. We explained but you do n’t ever trust your customers. Next morning we called to the hotel and explained why we want to talk to the manager. The staff said ‘ We apologize we found that it was a mistake. So we will not charge you. We apologize again for this mistake. ’It feels so bad to be treated like a thief.

Poor. A Block walk to beach but no other real reason. No parking very weird bad smell inside of the shower bathroom doors are farm doors which were not put on correctly and do not stay closed unles you put something there to hold the door closed so no real privacy I booked in advance requested extra towels no extra towels in my room when I went to the office to ask for some there were only two available not even enough for in the amount of guests I have with me I called them to ask for a late check out and they told me they could give me 30 minutes that would be all that they could do for me that I could use the parking lot which there was n’t even a place to park in the first place.
